item.title: Move Away,'More Blacks, More Dogs, More Irish'
item.description: Move Away, ‘More Blacks, More Dogs, More Irish’, 10 layer lithograph, 38cm x 27.9cm, (2023), made at Hole Editions, edition size 4. Two prints available to buy, contact issy.tessier@gmail.com for prices.
